summary: CAR SHAKES AND IT FEELS LIKE THE TIRES SKIP. IT HAPPENS MOSTLY WHEN THE CAR IS WARM AND I'M GOING AROUND A CORNER. HAS BEEN TO THE DEALER SEVERAL TIMES FOR THE SAME THING.THEY REPLACED THE CLUTCH AND DID OTHER THINGS BUT IT KEEPS HAPPENING. IT IS CURRENTLY AT THE DEALERS (ROCHESTER INDIANA FORD)AGAIN FOR THE SAME PROBLEM. THIS LAST TIME I WAS DRIVING ON ICE AND THE CAR STARTED SHAKING.I LOST CONTROL AND WENT UP A CURB. I POPPED THE TIRE. I COULD HAVE KILLED SOMEONE IF THEY WERE STANDING THERE.IT WAS VERY SCARY AND I'M AFRAID TO DRIVE THIS CAR AGAIN KNOWING IT'S NOT SAFE.  *TR
